boardgame.name: Crawling Chaos
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Watch Your Back. Run.

After finding a dead body, university students are hunted by a relentless supernatural entity that seems to know their deepest secrets and desires. As they run from certain death, the students must uncover the university’s occult past, find a crumbling church in the woods, deal with a dangerous artifact and confront an ancient evil.

Can the players investigate the horror…while running away from it?

Crawling Chaos is a Lovecraftian horror scenario set in the present day. It is playable in one or two sessions and comes with six pre-generated characters, complete with motivations and secrets.

The scenario functions as a terrifying “one-shot” but can also serve as the opening chapter of a present-day campaign that sees the players face off against the malign influence of Nyarlathotep, The Crawling Chaos. The campaign is supported by the [Expanded Campaign Edition] of this book, which also includes adventure-building tools and a compendium of spells and creatures.

boardgame.name: Crawling Chaos: Expanded Campaign Edition
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Old Ones, New Terrors

“To a season of political and social upheaval was added a strange and brooding apprehension of hideous physical danger; a danger widespread and all-embracing, such a danger as may be imagined only in the most terrible phantasms of the night.”
H.P. Lovecraft – Nyarlathotep

Something rotten lies behind the manufactured images of the modern age, and it is spreading. A vile, malevolent thing. It is the rage in the eyes of a bully, the voice that goads on a killer, the certainty that there’s something staring at you from the darkness beyond the half open closet door. It tricks us into believing lies and rejecting the truth. It spreads fear and rage and greed, and feeds from those things. Whenever we succumb to our darkest impulses, we give it power. And so it grows, little by little, relentlessly—the Crawling Chaos.

Crawling Chaos is a modern Lovecraftian horror campaign in which daring citizens lead secret lives investigating the many forms of Nyarlathotep and their human puppets. The book puts a distinctly modern spin on Lovecraftian horror gaming, both in content and presentation:

A diverse and relatable set of characters.
A modern, familiar setting: horror that hits close to home, inspired by modern fears.
A focus on unique monsters and antagonists, not just the familiar tentacled menaces of old.
Nyarlathotep is unique in Lovecraft’s pantheon, manifesting not as an alien entity beyond our understanding, but as a more human and personal manipulator of our desires and fears.
Rather than presenting a scripted campaign, the book gives you an initial scenario and a set of tools to help you build your own campaign around it.
Jam-packed with ideas and inspiration on every page, with dozens of locations, NPCs, nefarious schemes, adventure seeds, horrific moments, nightmarish monstrosities and more.
Tools for players to create interesting characters, and for the GM to build scenarios using the people and places the PCs care about. In this campaign, the PCs are not globe-trotting adventurers looking for danger in faraway lands. Here, the danger is close to home, and sometimes it finds them.
The campaign-building tools are system-agnostic, so they are equally useful with any game system.

The book is divided into three parts:

Part 1: A fully detailed scenario with everything required to play. The scenario functions either as a “one-shot” or as an “origin story” of a full campaign. And it is available for free! If you dare to crack open this premium expanded version, you'll also get…

Part 2: A campaign toolkit containing dozens of system-less tables to generate PC backgrounds, locations, NPCs, nightmarish monstrosities, weird artifacts, sinister plots, disturbing scenes and more.

Part 3: A compendium of spells and creatures of the Cthulhu Mythos, adapted to the ELEMENTAL RPG.

boardgame.name: The Terminator RPG Quickstart II
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Terminator RPG: Quickstart Part II is a 12-page PDF featuring a mission that may be played on its own or adapted as a direct sequel to 'Two Steps Back' (the mission from The Terminator RPG: Quickstart) or played on its own. The mission should be used as a springboard, but don’t be afraid to switch things up, the players are likely to come up with all sorts of interesting and novel ways around the problems you present...that is the game.

One Step Forward
This pre-Judgment Day mission (circa 1980s) is designed for 3-6 players. The Player Characters (PCs) from the first Quickstart can carry over into this one—those who survive it, anyway—and the experience of this game is greatly enhanced by having made it through ‘Two Steps Back’ first.

Mission Briefing
A group of Resistance fighters managed to break into a Skynet compound, utilizing the Time Displacement Equipment to travel back in time with the aim of assassinating a senior member of Cyberdyne’s research team. The problem, of course, lies in the fact that a trio of Terminators has been dispatched with the express purpose of protecting the same scientist—so everything is set for a particularly ugly battle through the streets and research labs of LA.

boardgame.name: ツミカブリ(Order of Sin)
boardgame.description:
It's been a long time, dear magicians. Welcome to the auction hall where demons dance with malicious intent. This time you need all eight demons in your possession to complete the dark ritual. Don’t worry if you don’t collect them all this time, you’ll get another chance. As long as you collect more than the other magicians, you will get out of here alive.

ツミカブリ(Order of Sin) is a bidding and deckbuilding game where you try to collect Demon Cards. Every player starts with the same deck of cards. All you have to do every turn is lay down a card from your hand and point to the card you want.

The important question is whether you and another player point to the same card. If only one player points to a card, they acquire it without revealing their bid. If multiple players point to the same card, they reveal their cards to decide the winner. Some revealed cards also activate special effects.

At the end of the game, the winner is the player who holds the largest number of different Demon Cards in their hand.

boardgame.name: Tales of Depravity!
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

There’s something lurking out there.

It carries with it a book. A red book.

The book contains devilry,
printed on its very pages.

Every tale from this book will scratch at your
soul until it leaves a cavity.

Evil shall fill that hole.

Tales of Depravity! is a sourcebook for Players and Directors wanting a set of chilling, playable tales of They Came from Beyond the Grave!, with three striking stories taking you to different locations, pitting you against an array of foes, and exposing the innards of evil!

They Came from Beyond the Grave! uses the Storypath System, which you can find in the pages of the They Came from Beyond the Grave! rulebook.

Tales of Depravity! includes:

Three horrifying new stories!
Advice and tools for play with your regular gaming group or for running as a convention one-shot!
Gripping fiction, in some cases tied to the tales within, in others existing to inspire and shock you to your core!
boardgame.rpg: They Came from Beyond the Grave!

boardgame.name: Les Sciences et l'Infini
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Faible, assiégée, inoffensive, la Ligue des planètes libres semble sans défense face à la violence du dernier millénaire.

Pourtant, ses citoyens et ses dirigeants ont foi dans leurs valeurs et leur avenir. Convaincus que la science et la raison leur permettront de triompher de toutes les embûches, ils s’élancent dans l’espace pour y trouver la paix et la clef des secrets du cosmos. Soudés par l’égalité qui règne dans la Ligue et galvanisés par les libertés dont ils jouissent, ils travaillent tous pour le bien commun et le futur de l’humanité.

Les trésors scientifiques et l’audace de la Ligue séduisent de plus en plus de pirates de l’espace. Ceux qui s’aventurent dans cette nation atypique découvrent une nouvelle façon d’envisager l’univers et parfois même un nouveau sens à leur vie. Ils pénètrent un monde merveilleux, gouverné par les sciences, et l’infini !

Les Sciences et l’Infini est le quatrième supplément pour Metal Adventures, le jeu de rôles des pirates de l’espace. Il s’adresse aux joueurs et aux meneurs de jeu de Metal Adventures.

Dans Les Sciences et l’Infini, vous trouverez :

De nouvelles aptitudes, compétences et qualités pour votre personnage
Des règles optionnelles concernant les métaordinateurs du dernier millénaire et l’exploration
spatiale
La description complète de la Ligue des planètes libres et de ses systèmes planétaires
Les secrets de la Ligue des planètes libres et de Concordia
Des fiches de PNJ et d’équipages
Le cinquième scénario de la campagne officielle El Barco del Sol !.
Le plan des avant-postes de la Ligue des planètes libres
À l’abordage !

boardgame.name: Dragonarch Mesa
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Explore adventurous locations across the multiverse with the Geographica line!

Born from the final battle between the kingly beasts Lev'ha-tan and Ba'ha-mot, the Dragonarch Mesa is an arid landscape where only the tough survive.

Will you join the nomadic tribes of the Tarras-Khan as they ride their giant lizards in a neverending pilgrimage, or study the secrets of the dragon at the Monastery of the Placid Cairn? Through which path will you unlock the arcane secrets of sanguinite and tap into the power of the kingly beasts? The choice is yours.

Dragonarch Mesa features a tour and lore of the mesa and its inhabitants, as well as new games rules including the secrets of sanguinite, the Path of Lev'ha-tan, a Barbarian subclass, and the Way of Ba'ha-mot, a Monk subclass.

Pack your gear and travel the lands of the River Sideralis with Geographica!

boardgame.name: Occultists
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Invisible World awaits!

Who knows what psychic energies resonate from persons, places, and things? The legendary occultist knows! Legendary Occultists is the latest volume in our series of player-focused Pathfinder Roleplaying Game supplements, heaped with hidden alternatives for everyone’s favorite hoarding spellcaster! Capable of comprehending the inexplicable, Occultists blend academia with adventure, calling forth the hidden powers of antiques and locales in order to uncover the greater truths of reality. In this extra-sensational supplement, players will uncover not only new options for the classic occultist, but an entire alternate class: the legendary occultist! Armed with an array of otherworldly powers and abilities, this restructured version offers new class abilities, such as Spell Raiding, Antiques, Historical Figures, Ley Lines, Ambience, and sundry talent-like Electives. With inspiration drawn from the real-life occultists of recent centuries, these new options include: the Legendary Occultist Alternate Class, 9 archetypes, 59 electives, 7 class bonuses, 42 feats (including 20 mythic feats), 8 implement schools, as well as alternate class features that replace Aura Sight, Object Reading, and Magic Item Skill; with loads of other diverse secrets to give your master-of-the-hidden a plenitude of powers!

boardgame.name: Amazing Standard Digital 001: Maxwell's TV And Appliance Repair
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In this augural article of Neighborhood Highlights, we are going to focus a spotlight onto one of the special places in our city and the associated people that are making their world a better place. In the small suburb of Neotroplis you can find small shops that are still surviving in this modern era. One of these shops is Maxwell’s TV and Appliance Repair. The unremarkable building looks like most of the other stores in the neighborhood. The windows and doors have bars over them, the peeling paint is tagged with gang graffiti, and the parking lot is home to a few abandoned cars. Yet, in the middle of this depressing scene, there is hope.

boardgame.name: Judgment Day (SWADE - 3rd Edition)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

If you are reading this, then you have already been admitted into the ranks of the Inquisition. Whether you take up the reins as an inquisitor or act as a member of your inquisitor’s retinue, your life has now permanently changed. What I’m about to share with you may never leave the confines of your mind; if it does, you will be branded a rogue and hunted down.

History is a lie. What you learn has been censored by those who would keep you ignorant, but ignorance brings safety. A fragile mind will crack beneath the pressures of the truth and carrying the burden of knowledge can break even the strongest souls. But you are different; you are prepared to be enlightened.

Welcome to Judgment Day, a supernatural hunting role-playing game for Savage Worlds Adventure Edition. Now in its 3rd edition, Judgment Day places players in the role of those employed by the Inquisition to protect all of humankind from the dangers that lurk in the darkness. Placed in the latter decades of the 19th century, during the throes of the Second Coming of the Occult, all of life is in your hands as you face down the dangers that wish to open the gates of the chaos realm and enslave humankind at the hands of demons, malevolent beings, and the heretics that serve them.

Judgment Day includes everything players and GMs need to run adventures and campaigns with character options, new equipment, adversaries, mission frameworks, and a detailed look at the setting. Placed within the alternate historical fantasy timeline known as Shadowed Earth, it takes place in a familiar 19th century where folklore, mythology, and the horrors of history are made real.

It is time you learn your duties.

Inside the pages of this Judgment Day core setting guide you will find:

New options for building your characters.
A detailed look at the setting.
A collection of mysteries and missions to play.
A complete mission builder.
105 adventure hooks to tie your games to the setting.
And much more!

boardgame.name: Jack Nicklaus' Course Designer Clip Art: Volume 1
boardgame.description:
Everything you need to build your dream-18 instantly! Plus a bonus Nicklaus course!

More Than 50 Finished Objects. Trees. Golf carts. Rocks. Buildings. Animals. A fountain. Even a ball washer!

Three New Land Plots. Route a course over stunning new geography. Choose a seaside vista. Luck parkland. Or the stark drama of the desert.

All new, Ready-to-Play Course. Tee it up at Desert Highlands Golf Course, the pride of Arizona and the original home of The Skins GameTM.

Eight New Scenic Backgrounds.
Pick the perfect horizon, including mountain, seashore and parkland.

- from the back of the box
boardgame.videogameexpansion: Jack Nicklaus' Unlimited Golf & Course Designer

boardgame.name: A Familiar Problem
boardgame.description:
'Distributor Blurb'

A new one-page RPG of magical familiars on a mission! Created by Marisha Ray (Critical Role) and designed by Grant Howitt (Honey Heist), you'll play a scrappy team of summoned magical creatures, left behind as the spellcasters went adventuring. To prove you're up to adventure, too, band together and undertake a daring quest of your own!

boardgame.name: Rechenkoenig In Den Vier Rechenarten
boardgame.description:
Math learning game with plastic number pieces and plastic board with basic math calculations, with holes to fit the right numbers.

At the start of the game plastic pieces are randomly distributed evenly to the players. Player with the number one piece starts the game by putting it to it's place in the leftmost space in uppermost line. After that player who has the next correct piece places it to the next open space. If you can fill the last space in the line, then you can give every other player one of your pieces. The player who'll first get rid of all of their pieces is the winner.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Jack Nicklaus Presents The Major Championship Courses of 1991
boardgame.description:
Play the Grand Slam Courses of 1991

U.S. Open Championship: Hazeltine National Golf Club, Chaska, Minnesota

British Open Championship: Royal Birkdale Golf Club, Southport, England

PGA Championship: Crooked Stick Golf Club, Carmel, Indiana

- from the back of the box
boardgame.videogameexpansion: Jack Nicklaus' Greatest 18 Holes of Major Championship Golf
Jack Nicklaus' Unlimited Golf & Course Designer

boardgame.name: Cult of Enyo
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Mystery cults are secret societies that exist within religious institutions. Like other secret societies, their existence is well known, but their rituals, lore, and objectives are concealed. Only the initiated are allowed access to these secrets.

This file provides an overview of mystery cults and specific details about the Cult of Enyo, one of the most fearsome and dreadful deities in the Amazons vs Valkyries setting.

Features:

Sample cult secrets
The location of Enyo's temples and sacred sites
The Day of Blood and other festivals held in Enyo's honor
Four New Magic Items: including Enyo's torch and Enyo's mask
Paladin's Oath of Destruction
If you're playing an Amazons vs Valkyries campaign, this cult is essential. If you are playing another fantasy campaign with a brutal and devastating war goddess, you should still check this out! And if your campaign doesn't have a bloodthirsty deity of sieges, war, and destruction, it should!

boardgame.name: Jack Nicklaus Signature Tour: Vol.1
boardgame.description:
"In both the U.S. and the U.K., the name Muirfield means great golf."

"The Links of Muirfield in Scotland and Muirfield Village Golf Club in Ohio are as different from each other as the windswept moors of Scotland are from the lush woodlands of Ohio. Yet the share the distinction of being among the greatest golf courses in the world today. Now here's your chance to tee off and experience the same golfing thrills these thirty-six superb holes have always brought me."

- quote from Jack Nicklaus on the back of the box
boardgame.videogameexpansion: Jack Nicklaus' Unlimited Golf & Course Designer

boardgame.name: Jack Nicklaus: Signature Tour Vol. 2
boardgame.description:
The 1993 Accolade Design Contest: Champion's Tour

Featuring the top 36 Winners

Designing a Golf Course is Like Putting Together a Jigsaw Puzzle

"Great golf courses are made up of 18 unique holes, each as different from the others as the varied pieces of a jigsaw puzzle. That same originality of design is what makes these two courses exceptional. All 36 holes were designed by players just like you. The fairways are tough. The approaches are challenging. The greens are tricky. These holes are exactly what you'd expect from players who know what great golf is all about. I've designed dozens of championship courses, and teed it up on hundreds more. And, believe me, these holes rank with some of the best I've ever seen." - Jack Nicklaus

- from the front and back of the box

boardgame.name: Cleric Domain: Voyage Domain
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Gods of voyages are the patron deities of travelers and wanderers, offering them a sense of home and belonging however far they may roam. Wanderlust is often a common trait of their clerics who can unsurprisingly be found wherever others may travel, whether that destination be an unknown land, another plane, or even among the stars.

Building off of the existing Fifth Edition rules to build a cleric character, the Voyage Domain gives you options to build an adventurous cleric who finds themselves on extended journeys through providence or divine intervention, using keepsakes they gather along the way to augment their channel divinity powers.

boardgame.name: burncycle: Promo Missions
boardgame.description: This set contains 4 promo missions for burncycle, one per corporation, and can be obtained as a reward for resolving the burncycle lore recruitment portfolio riddle.

boardgame.name: Pocket Crystal League
boardgame.description:
A 5-lane card-battler using a system similar to Inscryption, but with Pokemon-themed monsters.

The campaign offers a steady stream of opponents to fight for money, and ways to spend the money to upgrade your deck of cards. Endless grinding available for those who want it, but imperfect decks can still handily defeat bosses with a bit of luck and skill.

boardgame.name: two seesaws
ツーシーソー
boardgame.description:
two seesaws is a trick-taking game for 1 to 5 players. The card play is a standard "must-follow" game. There are a series of cards which determine how the trick is resolved.

Two "SEE/SAW" cards determine half of the trump suit, the orientation the winner of a trick places it in, and will be flipped to its opposite side if a black card wins the current trick.

Two "HIGH/LOW" cards determine if low numbers or high numbers win the trick, and will be flipped to its opposite side if a red card wins the trick.

The combination of the two cards in play form a single suit icon which specifies the trump suit.

At the end of each hand, players will earn points for alternating winning SEE and SAW tricks, or something similar to that. Unpaired SEE or SAW tricks will lose a player points. The player with the most points wins.

boardgame.name: Green Team Wins - Gaming Community Promo Pack
boardgame.description:
Collection of 30 cards for use in the game. There are 10 different new cards in each of the three categories. All of the cards are related to board gaming.

The card content was created through a collaboration with: Gaming with Sidekicks, One Board Family, Board Game Spotlight, and Tantrum House.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Winter Offensive Bonus Pack #13: ASL Scenario Bonus Pack for Winter Offensive 2022
boardgame.description:
ASL Winter Offensive Bonus Pack #13 (2022) features four new scenarios (WO39-WO42) using deluxe-style maps as well as three new deluxe-style maps (m, n, o).

Proceeds from sales benefit the WWII Foundation.

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 4 - Abr 2015)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 4.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

Nivel 9 número 4 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones y un escenario para Walküre.

Nace una nueva revista de juegos de rol de mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones. Siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene, en sus 66 páginas, material para tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones: entrevistas, módulos, escenarios, ayudas de juego, avances... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El cuarto número de la revista contiene: un escenario de campaña para Walküre, dos ayudas de juego (una para NSd20 y otra para El Reino de la Sombra), tres aventuras (una para Cultos Innombrables, otra para Eyes Only y otra para Hitos), una ambientación de la antigua Grecia para el sistema Hitos y el tercer número de las historias Sentinel Rebirth para La Mirada del Centinela.

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Josu Bermúdez, Ricardo Dorda, Alejandro Iglesias y Gaizka Márquez, y con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: La llamada más allá del tiempo. Parte 1
Luz del Primer Día. Misión 2: La isla de los espías

boardgame.name: Intro: Year of Boundless Wonder
boardgame.description:
'User description'

The introductory scenario for Pathfinder Society's Year of Boundless Wonder, originally released at Gencon 2022

boardgame.name: The Post of the Past and at Present
boardgame.description:
Typical roll and move game about the post delivering history around the world (from Europe, Asia, North America, Africa).
The first player, who cross the route with 41 stops first, wins the game.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Escape Game: Die Pyramide des Pharao
boardgame.description: A game with cards and many puzzles waiting to be solved so that the pyramid can be left - just like in a real Escape Room! A journey through history; full of puzzles that help develop logical skills, mathematical thinking, observation skills and language. The cards hide useful clues to continue the adventure and exit the pyramid. The game includes a set of puzzle cards, a game board and useful items to find the clues.

boardgame.name: Escape Game: Das verfluchte Schloss
boardgame.description:
On a school trip you visit a castle. As soon as you enter, all the doors close and you are trapped in the castle. Now you have to find the exit together.

The game includes a set of puzzle cards, a game board and useful items to find the clues.

boardgame.name: Escape Game: Das Labor des Dr. Frank
boardgame.description:
Aliens have abducted you while you were searching in space for new planets where humans could live. Now you are locked in the cockpit of your spaceship: Try to free yourself and return to Earth!

The game includes a set of puzzle cards, a game board and useful items to find the clues.

boardgame.name: Escape Game: Abenteuer in London
boardgame.description:
The legendary secrets of the breathtaking metropolis of London are finally to be uncovered. For this, you are needed as an investigator! Explore every corner of the mysterious city and solve the numerous tricky puzzles and secrets you encounter along the way. Only in this way will there be an escape at the end to pass the exciting adventure.

The game includes a set of puzzle cards, a game board and useful items to find the clues.

boardgame.name: Escape Game: Abenteuer in London
boardgame.description:
You have just arrived at a museum when suddenly the lights go on and off continuously.... and the windows open and close without you being able to hold them. You look for the exit, but realise that the museum is a veritable labyrinth of rooms and corridors: You are lost!
The game includes a set of puzzle cards, a game board and useful items to find the clues.

boardgame.name: Kampfgeschwader vorwärts!
boardgame.description:
Military strategy game based on aerial bombing raids. One of many propaganda-based wargames published in Nazi Germany before WWII.

The board is on heavy cardstock and depicts various terrain features with a superimposed grid for movement of units.

The game comes with 28 toy figures made of tin: 20 aircraft (6 twin-engine bombers and 4 fighters for each player) and 8 anti-aircraft guns (4 for each player). There are also 12 round paper counters (6 for each player). Each unit has a value on the bottom to represent the impact of capture.

—user summary

boardgame.name: Escape Game: Das geheimnisvolle Museum
boardgame.description:
You have just arrived at a museum when suddenly the lights go on and off continuously.... and the windows open and close without you being able to hold them. You look for the exit, but realise that the museum is a veritable labyrinth of rooms and corridors: You are lost!

The game includes a set of puzzle cards, a game board and useful items to find the clues.

boardgame.name: Gerrymander
boardgame.description:
Players will be a politician and they will be gerrymandering the board. The player with the most district wins.
This turn-based game introduces the concept of gerrymandering in the most relevant way. These days, the game is highly sensitive, and there is a need to educate more people about the repercussions of democracy

The players will start with some cash to purchase the corruption cards to change and manipulate the voters on the board. Once the players finish their money in the campaign phase, they will start the gerrymander phase with the district pieces they purchase in the campaign phase.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 5 - Jul 2015)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 5.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

Nivel 9 número 5 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones y un suplemento para sLAng.

Nace una nueva revista de juegos de rol de mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones. Siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene, en sus 66 páginas, material para tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones: entrevistas, módulos, ayudas de juego... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El quinto número de la revista contiene: dos ayudas de juego (una para NSd20 y otra para El Reino de la Sombra), cuatro aventuras (una para Fragmentos, otra para Aquelarre, otra para Cultos Innombrables y otra para Lances), una ambientación de la antigua Grecia para El Reino de la Sombra y para Cuando los Titanes Reinan (una ambientación que podrás encontrar en el anterior número de la revista), una entrevista a Justin Achilli, la cuarta entrega de las historias Sentinel Rebirth para La Mirada del Centinela y una nueva entrega de Luz del Primer Día. Como extra, este número de la revista incluye La Noche de la Pantera, un suplemento de doce páginas para sLAng con reglas para convertirlo al sistema Hitos.

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Josu Bermúdez, Ricardo Dorda, Rodrigo Fernández, Alfonso Gutiérrez y Joan Redon y con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: La llamada más allá del tiempo. Parte 2
Luz del Primer Día. Misión 3: Las tres caras de Iscariote
Los secretos de la bóveda celeste
Sentinel Rebirth: La antesala del caos

boardgame.name: Die Legenden von Andor: Santa Gor
boardgame.description:
The Santa Gor is an official free print & play bonus hero for the Legends of Andor base game and its expansions. He can carry almost no items, but leaves a free gift for the other heroes whenever he arrives at a building.

He was released on Christmas 2021 and can be played using the archer's green materials.

Each time the Santa Gor ends his move action on a space with a building, he may place any item from the merchant's inventory (except the witch's brew) on that space. That item can only be picked up by another hero. The Santa Gor can only place one item per building space.

boardgame.name: Space Rally
boardgame.description:
Take a seat in a spaceship and race through solar storms and asteroid fields to victory.

Each person controls a spaceship and tries to reach the finish line first over 3 stages.
But the opponents will not watch idly as you steer your spaceship smoothly across the finish line. They will literally put obstacles in your way: Asteroids.
So you'll have to shoot your way through the asteroids or navigate around them. However, asteroid fragments are rich in rare metals. If you collect the fragments during the race, you can exchange them for upgrades to your ship at the end of the stage.
Besides, you'll have to contend with solar storms, which you should avoid in any case.

Pick up your dice, choose an action from your multi-use cards and fly to victory.

Will you be the first to reach the finish line and get fame and glory?
Find out in: Space Rally

–description from the designer

boardgame.name: Il gioco di Cattivik
boardgame.description: Cattivik and the rats have to go through the maze of the sewers in search of a loot, made up of different objects. But our characters get in the way of each other and the labyrinth changes its appearance at every turn and so it is not easy to find everything, get rid of the bad luck and return to the starting point: whoever succeeds first wins!

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 6 - Mar 2016)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 6.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

¡El último número de la primera temporada ya está aquí!

Nivel 9 número 6 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones.

Nace una nueva revista de juegos de rol de mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones. Siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene, en sus 66 páginas, material para tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones: entrevistas, módulos, ayudas de juego... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El sexto número de la revista contiene: cinco ayudas de juego (una para Perros en la Viña, otra para Plenilunio, otra para Cultos Innombrables, otra para 3:16 Masacre en la Galaxia y otra para El Reino de la Sombra), cuatro aventuras (una para Cultos Innombrables, otra para Do: Peregrinos del Templo Volador, otra para Hitos y otra para Fragmentos), la quinta entrega de las historias Sentinel Rebirth para La Mirada del Centinela y una nueva entrega de Luz del Primer Día.

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Patricia de Blas, Álvaro Corcín, Edén Claudio Ruíz, Ricardo Dorda, Enrique Camino, Alfonso Gutierrez y Pedro J. Ramos y con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpg: Do: Pilgrims of the Flying Temple
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: La Llamada más allá del tiempo. Parte 3.
Luz del Primer Día. Misión 4: La Sexta Copa del Apocalipsis

boardgame.name: The Wall: Murder on 168th Street
boardgame.description:
Three boxes for three stories await you: work in a team and ask the right questions... the answers may surprise you.

The Wall - Murder on 168th Street is part of a trilogy: three investigating games that will keep you nailed to the table with bated breath!

Try to shed light on a mysterious event, collecting valuable clues between places to explore carefully, objects to analyze, and pressing interrogations. At the end of the investigation, you will be asked some questions that will measure how able you have been in solving the mystery, getting points for each correct answer. Each investigation is divided into several chapters that will allow you to continue the investigation. The detective's work seems to never end, and one case leads to another: if you feel able to answer the final questions, turn the card!

In The Wall - Murder on 168th Street, a high school student, promising basketball player and very popular, is found dead along the road that every day took him from the field, where he trained early in the morning, to school.
He lived in a poor neighborhood, but everything points that it isn't just a simple robbery.

boardgame.name: The Wall: Crime Under the Spotlights
boardgame.description:
Three boxes for three stories await you: work in a team and ask the right questions... the answers may surprise you.

The Wall - Crime under the spotlights is part of a trilogy: three investigating games that will keep you nailed to the table with bated breath!

Try to shed light on a mysterious event, collecting valuable clues between places to explore carefully, objects to analyze, and pressing interrogations. At the end of the investigation, you will be asked some questions that will measure how able you have been in solving the mystery, getting points for each correct answer. Each investigation is divided into several chapters that will allow you to continue the investigation. The detective's work seems to never end, and one case leads to another: if you feel able to answer the final questions, turn the card!

In The Wall - Crime under the spotlights, a famous actor dies on the set of his last film because of a real bullet, loaded into a gun that had to shoot blanks, while shooting the last scene. How did this happen? In the show business nothing is as it seems and everyone has something to hide.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 7 - Jul 2016)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 7.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

¡El primer número de la segunda temporada ya está aquí!

Nivel 9 número 7 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones.

Nace una nueva revista de juegos de rol de la mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones. Siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene, en sus 66 páginas, material para tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones: entrevistas, módulos, ayudas de juego... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El séptimo número de la revista contiene: cuatro ayudas de juego (una para Apocalypse World, otra para Dungeon Spain, otra para Hitos y otra para El Reino de la Sombra), seis aventuras (una para Reflejo, otra para Cultos Innombrables, otra para Blacksad, otra para Plenilunio, y otra para Pequeños Detectives de Monstruos) y la sexta entrega de las historias Sentinel Rebirth para La Mirada del Centinela.

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Josu Bermúdez, Pablo Claudio Ganter, Ricardo Dorda, Alejandro Iglesias, Jordi Martín, Antonio L. Ocaña y Pedro J. Ramos, con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: Las dos caras de la moneda
Hitos de la Historia: Segunda Guerra Mundial
La Llamada más allá del tiempo. Parte 4.
Lo que se esconde por las noches
Sentinel Rebirth: Sangre sobre el asfalto

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 8 - Sep 2016)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 8.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

¡Un número especial de la revista Nivel 9 de Aquelarre!

Nivel 9 número 8 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones.

Nace una nueva revista de juegos de rol de la mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones. Siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene, en sus 66 páginas, material para Aquelarre: entrevistas, módulos, ayudas de juego... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El octavo número de la revista contiene: siete ayudas de juego, cuatro aventuras, dos ambientaciones y dos entrevistas (una a Ricard Ibáñez y otra a Stewart Wick).

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Ricard Ibáñez, Miguel Ángel Ruíz, Albert Tarrés i Figueras, Iván Abad, Rodrigo Fernández, Juan Pablo Fernández del Río, Pablo Rabanal y Ana Navalón, con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: Compendio de creación de armas modificadas
De Bandidos, Piratas, Desapariciones y otras Historias en Huelva
El Homiciano. Una Profesión de Frontera para Aquelarre
El Último Banquete de Don Munita de Castilliscar

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 9 - Dic 2016)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 9.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

Nivel 9 número 9 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones y un suplemento para El Club de los Martes.

Nace una nueva revista de juegos de rol de mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones. Siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene, en sus 66 páginas, material para tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones: entrevistas, módulos, ayudas de juego... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El noveno número de la revista contiene: cuatro ayudas de juego (una para Plenilunio, otra para Hitos, otra para Cultos Innombrables y otra para ambientaciones medievales), cinco aventuras (una para Atomic Robo, otra para Blacksad, otra para Cultos Innombrables y otra para El Reino de la sombra con Dungeon Spain y otra para The Dresden Files). Como extra, este número de la revista incluye El Canto de Cassilda, un suplemento de quince páginas para El Club de los Martes.

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Enrique Camino, Ricardo Dorda, Antonio Peiro y Luis F. Tadevs y con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: El Fervor que Cayó del Cielo
Hitos de la historia: siglos XVIII y XIX
La llamada más allá del tiempo. Parte 5.
Los peligros de un mundo en decadencia

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 10 - Abr 2017)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 10.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

Nivel 9 número 9 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones.

Nace una nueva revista de juegos de rol de mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones. Siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene, en sus 68 páginas, material para tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones: entrevistas, módulos, ayudas de juego... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El décimo número de la revista contiene: cinco ayudas de juego (una para Dreamraiders y Fate, otra para Worlds in Peril, otra para Hitos, otra para Cultos Innombrables y otra para ambientaciones del Salvaje Oeste), cinco aventuras (una para Plenilunio, otra para Pendragón, otra para Labyrinth Lord, otra para Unrealms y otra para Los Ojos del Águila) y tres escenarios (uno para Cultos Innombrables, otro para 3:16 Masacre en la Galaxia y otro para Mutant Year Zero).

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Enrique Camino, Ricardo Dorda, Ismael D. Sacaluga y Diego López y con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: Dreamraiders by Fate: el destino de tus sueños
La Liga de los Mares Trémulos
Sacrificios en el Claustro de Milakosh

boardgame.name: Cyber Seeds: Collection 07
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Oy, budzo! Are you running a game of Cyberpunk, Shadowrun, Carbon 2185, The Sprawl, or something similar? Sometimes you need a quick story for your players. Not a complete campaign, or even an adventure, but something you can modify to fit your table. You need a Cyber Seed.

This is the Corporate Collection, choomba! Brief details of a dozen corps, yet open enough that you can add/change details, and make it your own. Use them as-is, flesh them out, or use just the description as the base of your own adventure.

This system-agnostic collection includes:

There are few animals or plants any more, but Flippy Dippy Chippies keep flying out of the factory. They've got guards everywhere. How do they make their snacks?
A payday loan corp that will literally sell your organs when you can't pay them back.
Competing military companies who are both trying to build the perfect cybernetic warriors in their basements.
A company making bank by growing food in high-rise buildings. That can't be all they're doing, is it? Really?

boardgame.name: NPCs: Wanted 08
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Your players' characters will run into many people during the course of a gaming session. Some will be wanted by the law or other authorities.

For in-person games, print out these pages and clip out a Wanted poster as a handout. For virtual games, show your players the section of the file for the fugitive you want them aware of.

This system-agnostic collection includes:

Female pumakin wanted alive as a witness to a death
Female orc warrior wanted dead or alive for destroying a tavern
Human male wanted dead or alive for impersonating a wizard
Female blue dragonborn wanted alive to negotiate with a dragon

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 11 - Sep 2017)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 11.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

El número 11 de nivel 9 ya está aquí!

Nivel 9 número 11 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones.

De la mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene material para tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones: entrevistas, módulos, ayudas de juego... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El número 11 de la revista contiene: Ayudas de juego (para Cultos Innombrables, para Plenilunio y una ayuda genérica.) y aventuras para Labyrinth Lord, Cultos Innombrables, Blacksad, Antiguo y colosa, La mirada del centinela y Unrealms)

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Pablo Claudio Ganter, Antonio L. Ocaña, Juan Sixto, Pablo Sixto, Paula Torres, Sergio Conde, Josu Bermúdez, José Antonio González Padilla, Iñaki Raya Bravo, Enrique Camino y José Lomo, con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: Hitos de la Historia: Ruta de la Seda
La Venganza del Brujo de Azoth

boardgame.name: Red Screen
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A group known as the Labyrinth Collective has created a computer virus called REDSCREEN. It is a highly infectious program spread via a weakness in IFOS, the de facto standard operating system for AIs. REDSCREEN stays seemingly dormant for a few while before causing the AIs to go on a violent rampage, attempting to kill everyone it comes in contact with.

Inside you will find

3 AIs and what happens to them while infected
An anti-AI Faction
Rules for infected PC androids

boardgame.name: The Ledge
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Crossing the frontier is always dangerous. It gets really dangerous when you're on a mountain ledge with an approaching storm front!

This adventure setting was designed for 5th Edition AD&D for the Filbar Campaign, for four, second level PCs.

boardgame.name: Saint-Gerrin Sewers
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Beneath the city of Saint-Gerrin lies an extensive sewer system - but it goes deeper than that!

A set of printable battlemaps compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A multiple level map consisting of a 3 20x60 battlemaps, each depicting a different level of a city sewer.
Level 1 - Sewers - sewer channels and tunnels, with large drains leading below.
Level 2 - Old Sewers - twisting ancient sewers, with a settlement of ratfolk.
Level 3 - Caves and Temple - long lost caves, filled with poisonous gas, and a forgotten temple

boardgame.name: Titanbone Woods
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The skeletal remains of a colossal being, slowly being reclaimed by the forest

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 30 x 30 map depicting a huge skeleton in the forest. The skull is inhabited by a witch, hag or hermit.

boardgame.name: The Sunken City of Thera
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A once majestic city, now deep beneath the waves

A printable rpg battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl or skirmish game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 60x60 map depicting a ruined Atlantean city, now deep under the sea, surrounded by fish and corals. A deep abyss splits the ruins.

boardgame.name: The River of the Dead
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A river of spirits to cross in the Underworld

A printable rpg battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl or skirmish game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 60x60 map depicting a cavern in the underworld, split by a river of souls.

Ideal for depicting Hades and the River Styx

boardgame.name: The Lost City of Ayve Thalor
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

An ancient Elven city, lost to time

A printable rpg battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl or skirmish game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 60x60 map depicting an ancient ruined Elven city, overgrown in a forest. A large river and canyon splits the city

boardgame.name: The Blighted Ruins
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A ruined city, sundered by a river of acid

A printable rpg battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl or skirmish game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 60x60 map depicting a ruined city with a river of corrosive acid or slime flowing through it.

boardgame.name: City of the Shadow Blade
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A ruined city in the Shadow Fell, the home of a powerful weapon

A printable rpg battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl or skirmish game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 60x60 map depicting a ruined city in the Shadow Realm. A magical sword rests in the Blade Circle temple, and a river flows through the ruins. Includes a no-sword version.

boardgame.name: Temple of the Warp Gate
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The power of worship allows the Warp Gate to transport you beyond the stars

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Wargame game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 30x60 battlemap depicting a futuristic sci-fi gothic temple with a portal. Ideal for W40K games

boardgame.name: Petraluna Corp Prison Mine
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

To be sent to the prison colony is to spend the rest of your life beneath the surface, endlessly mining

A set of printable battlemaps depicting a futuristic prison mine.

Contents:
Level 0 (30x30)- Lunar surface and admin buildings
Level 1 (30x30)- Offices and barracks
Level 2 (30x30)- Prison cells
Level 3 (30x90) - Mines

boardgame.name: Nivel 9 (Número 12 - Feb 2018)
boardgame.description:
Nivel 9, nº 12.
(Descripción de la web de la editorial)

El número 12 de nivel 9 ya está aquí!

Nivel 9 número 12 ya ha llegado, con todo lo que necesitas de tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones.

De la mano de Colectivo 9 y Nosolorol Ediciones siguiendo la estela de las clásicas revistas de juegos de rol, Nivel 9 pretende ser un reflejo de aquellos tiempos adaptado a los nuevos diseños y con material de máxima actualidad.

La nueva revista Nivel 9 contiene material para tus juegos favoritos de Nosolorol Ediciones: entrevistas, módulos, ayudas de juego... Todo lo que puedas necesitar para expandir tu experiencia de juego.

El número 12 de la revista contiene: Ayudas de juego (para Plenilunio, Fate Core, Unrealms, Lacuna ) y aventuras ( para Labyrinth Lord, Blacksad, Hitos, Aquelarre y The Dresden Files.)

Este número cuenta con la colaboración de Pablo Claudio Ganter, Antonio L. Ocaña, Juan Sixto, Pablo Sixto, Paula Torres, Sergio Conde, Josu Bermúdez, Enrique Camino, Rodrigo Fernández, David Fluhr Arnau, José Antonio González Padilla e Iñaki Raya Bravo, Luis F. Tadevs, con una nueva tira cómica de Andrés Palomino (Crónicas PSN).
boardgame.rpgissuearticle: La Danza del Hada de Azúcar
El Laberinto de Anomalus el Hechicero

boardgame.name: Zoo Square
boardgame.description:
Zoo Square is a corner matching game that is visual challenging and addictively fun. It is designed for kids and adults who love zoo animals and into all kinds of crazy puzzles.

The goal of the game is to be the fastest player to finish a 4-card puzzle. Four cards are randomly drawn from the deck, and you will need to arrange and rotate the 4 square cards into a 2x2 grid, so that the dangerous animals (elephants, lions, and crocodiles) are grouped by their kind, and fenced off from the free-roaming peacocks and the rest of the zoo.

A solution to the puzzle must meet the following two criteria:
1) The center 4 spaces contain the same kind of animals.
2) Each of the edge groups (made out of 2 spaces each) contain the same kind of animals.

There are 2 game modes for beginner and advance level players.

boardgame.name: Complices
boardgame.description:
Thieves in search of loot, you must catch as many coins as possible without touching the security lasers. But each of you have colored filter glasses that prevent you from seeing a laser color. You will therefore have to communicate as well as possible with your partner!

In this cooperative game, players have 2 minutes to steal as many coins as possible without hitting the security lasers present in the room. To do this, each player puts on glasses with a color filter preventing them from seeing one of the types of lasers (red or blue). The player with the red glasses must then trace a path in the room with the marker in order to recover the pieces, while the player with the blue glasses is his guide. It's up to them to communicate as well as possible to avoid obstacles! Each piece recovered is worth 1 point, each laser hit causes you to lose 1 point. The game is won if the players have won enough points to fill their hideout after 4 rounds.

Complices is made up of 16 different rooms for 4 levels of difficulty, with new laser shapes and new mechanics for each level.

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: Mini Crimes: omicidio a sangue freddo
boardgame.description:
In your hands you have an investigative case that you can play alone or with friends. It takes little space, a bit of time and a lot of ingenuity.
But remember, one case leads to another!

Six chapters for six compact boxes to carry with you in every situation: the box itself contains the rules of the game, and along with the deck of cards contained in it, it will be enough to get all the clues necessary to the resolution!

Mini Crimes is a cooperative investigative game in which you'll put your observation and deduction skills to the test to solve a mysterious case. You'll analyse a crime scene and up to 10 clues.
Choose carefully and solve the mystery!

In 'Mini Crimes: Omicidio a sangue freddo' ("Mini Crimes: Homicide in cold blood"), take a trip through time in 1948 and investigate the mysterious death of James Stein, Curator of Snakes at the Zoological Society of London, who died under very suspicious circumstances.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Invaders
boardgame.description:
The Earth was attacked by the aliens and it is in danger!
But, if you cooperate with each other, you can save it.

Invaders is a cooperative and memory-based game that is played in two phases:

the "planning" one where you have to deploy your interceptors based on the aliens that are drawn at every turn
the "invasion" one, where you check how well you did in the planning phase (and where you have few chances to correct your mistakes)


It contains 5 different difficulty levels, each introducing new material and rules.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Escape Game: Serial Killer
boardgame.description:
In the heart of London, innocent victims are at the mercy of a fearsome serial killer. Only you can save them. Investigate but watch out for time... the crime doesn't wait!

The Escape Room range is inspired by the Escape Room rooms. Find their incredible atmosphere at home! Go on an adventure, observe, manipulate and solve various puzzles that will put your logical mind to the test.

This Escape Game contains 8 scenarios of 60 minutes each.

boardgame.name: Adrift: A Puzzletale
boardgame.description:
Adrift is a new puzzletale from PostCurious in which players will take on the role of an expert dream interpreter in order to help someone understand the significance of the messages received through their subconscious. Solve your way through strange writings, beautiful illustrations, and various physical artifacts to discover a mysterious and ethereal world.

Adrift is played through four parts which can be completed in any order, each representing a different elemental spirit (Sky, Earth, Water, and Forest.) Each section of the game contains three sequential puzzles told through poems, an illustrated poster, and a physical item which needs to be assembled in order to derive a solution phrase.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Stonks
boardgame.description:
Stonks is a trick taking stock marketing game where each card ís a share and each suit is a company.

At the begining of the game six shares are opened on the table, creating a market and each player choose two cards to start your own display.

A Company drops value when a share enters the market and increase value when a share enters a player´s display.

The Company with more shares in the market is the trump. Trumps can win a trick but are only played if the player doesn´t have the leading suit.

The trick winner puts the lowest share of the trick in their display or change the card with one of the cards in the market.

At the end of the game players sell the display shares for the market value. The player with the most money wins.

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Heroes of Britain
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

So you want to set an adventure in Britain? In this book, we give you the basics on what it's like in the United Kingdom and what you need to know about setting adventures there. Things like how to get there, how does the law work in Britain and which places would be great for a super-fight.

We even give you nine player characters with ties to the United Kingdom to get you started.

boardgame.name: Cult of Demeter
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Mystery cults are secret societies that exist within religious institutions. Like other secret societies, their existence is well known, but their rituals, lore, and objectives are concealed. Only the initiated are allowed access to these secrets.

This file provides an overview of mystery cults and specific details about the Cult of Demeter, one of the most important and influential deities in the Amazons vs Valkyries setting.

Features:

Sample cult secrets
The location of Demeter's temples
The many festivals held in Demeter's honor
Paladin's Oath of the Sacred Journey
If you're playing an Amazons vs Valkyries campaign, this cult is essential. If you are playing another fantasy campaign with an omnipresent agricultural goddess, you should still check this out! And if your campaign doesn't have a powerful deity of fertility, abundance, and life, it should!

boardgame.name: Les Pirates de l'Espace
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Dans une Galaxie qui s’étend et s’épuise à l’infini, les pirates de l’espace sont le dernier espoir de l’humanité. Courageux, audacieux, altruistes et révoltés, ils parcourent inlassablement l’espace à la recherche de l’aventure. Peu importe le danger, ils vont toujours de l’avant, sabre au clair et sourire aux lèvres, pour un trésor, la gloire ou la justice.

Parce qu’ils sont libres et parce qu’ils soufflent sur les braises de la Révolte, les pirates sont pourchassés par toutes les nations stellaires. Traqués, insultés et parfois manipulés, ils refusent de mettre un genou à terre et sont prêts à affronter toutes les armadas de la Galaxie.

Car ils savent que leur combat va au-delà de coffres remplis d’or et de faits d’armes. Ils se battent pour ce qui fait l’essence de l’âme humaine : l’espoir.

Un supplément réservé aux personnages-joueurs !

CONTENU
Tous les secrets des pirates de l’espace !
De nouvelles origines pour créer un pirate havanais
De nouvelles aptitudes, compétences et qualités pour votre personnage
Les meilleures combines de loups de mer pour réussir vos aventures
Les secrets de la chasse aux trésors
Comment enflammer la Galaxie avec les règles de Révolte !
Du matériel conçu par les pirates pour les pirates, notamment les vaisseaux d’Annabella
La description complète du système Havana
Le résumé de tout ce qui a changé si vous avez fini El Barco del Sol

boardgame.name: La Belle et la Bête
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

L’humanité s’élance dans l’espace armée de sa science et de sa technologie. Pourtant, l’infini galactique n’est gouverné ni par la raison, ni par la logique. Il suffit d’une seule erreur de calcul pour être projeté par-delà l’espace, le temps et la réalité… Et il est des planètes si bizarres qu’elles pourraient convaincre que la magie existe !

Les pirates racontent sans cesse comment des vaisseaux ont combattu des êtres venus d’autres dimensions ou des monstres surgis du passé. Ces histoires sont incroyables, mais souvent vraies. Les vieux loups de mer savent que la réalité est parfois une illusion, et qu’il est alors difficile de faire la différence entre la belle… et la bête !

La Belle et la Bête est le sixième supplément pour Metal Adventures, le jeu de rôles des pirates de l’espace. Il s’adresse aux joueurs (avertis) et aux meneurs de jeu de Metal Adventures.

CONTENU
De nouvelles aptitudes, compétences et qualités pour votre personnage
Des règles optionnelles concernant la folie, les mutations et… la magie ?
La description complète des systèmes planétaires les plus bizarres de la Galaxie
Les secrets du surnaturel et de… [Top secret !]
Des fiches de PNJ, d’équipages et un nouveau monstre
Le septième scénario de la campagne officielle El Barco del Sol !.
Le plan d’une pyramide sacrificielle

boardgame.name: The Coroner Saga: Episode 4 - Hidden Mask
boardgame.description:
User Summary

When Christian Reverend's son were murdered, the murder removed the skin of his face - the coroner Sara is working on the case, but must choose her steps carefully as the FBI investigates the case or the reputation of the institute and herself could be seriously ruined!

boardgame.name: SHASN: Kickstarter Add-On Pack
boardgame.description:
Includes:

1 2-piece resource box
1 Edge of Chaos board
1 punch board for Home Turf, movable Volatile Zone, and IOU tokens
1 scenario book
1 SHASN comic book
13 Elite cards
12 Cost of Victory cards
5 drawstring bags for voter pegs

These items were not included with the retail version of the game.

boardgame.name: Comixxx Duality
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Flip some switches to make images fully appear: each switch can change multiple sections of the puzzle.

There are 15 levels to play through.

boardgame.name: Comixxx Strip
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Remove section of the board to reveal images - but do not have your line getting hit by the bouncing balls as you draw your selections!

boardgame.name: Pocket Landship
boardgame.description:
Pocket Landship is based on the print and play Board Game Geek Award nominated (2017) soloplay card wargame. In this version we see a steampunk theme and expanded gameplay with additional enemy and friendly options, as well as multiplayer options.

Command a Landship (the original British term for tanks) to clear a sector of enemy infantry, artillery, and enemy mech and alike.

The player chooses a Landship to control with weapons or support units to create either a single high powered Landship or a more disparate defending force, including a squad of shock troops.

The enemy appears as waves of enemy mech, artillery, infantry, and mine fields arranged in 2 rows of 3 cards.

Each turn, the player will roll 3 6-sided dice and assign each die to each of their cards to attack the enemies. Then, for the enemy turn, roll the 3 dice and assign them low to high left to right across the front enemy line, then take the assigned actions.

Each card has its own damage track. When a card is destroyed, it is removed from the game. Win by destroying all 9 enemy cards. Lose if the enemy destroys your landship.

-description from publisher

The black box version includes the Black Box (a bigger box) which will take sleeved cards. It also includes all the cards, dice and rule booklet from the standard version of Pocket Landship 2nd Edition (including the weather card and die) AND the cards from the 'No Man's Land' expansion.

The box will also have enough room for the sleeved versions of the Kickstarter exclusive cards unlocked during this campaign AND the 2 Driver KS Exclusive cards (which were available separately as an add-on) from the first KS.
boardgame.boardgamecompilation: Pocket Landship: Driver C. Andrews promo card
Pocket Landship: Driver Danielson promo card

boardgame.name: Psych! Ellen's Party Game
Psych! Party Game
boardgame.description:
OUTWIT YOUR FRIENDS
Make up fake answers to real trivia questions and score points when you psych out your friends in this hilarious party game based on the popular app.

BRING TO YOUR NEXT PARTY
Choose a category and read the question, make up an answer and pin it to the board, then wait and see who you psyched out. Win even more points if you pick the right answer.

4 FUN CATEGORIES
Features 4 different categories for you to psych out your friends: Is That A Fact, Word Up, Movie Bluff and The Truth Comes Out. Shuffle them all together for a more random game.

Includes: 1 Gameboard, 2 Paper Pads, 200 Cards, 1 Magnetic Pin Board, 8 Movers, 1 Magnet Sheet, 1 Sticker Sheet, Instructions.

boardgame.name: Lumen Void
boardgame.description:
Game- A Score and Reset Hand Management Game involving a process of discarding and drawing cards to complete sets and combos with the objective of achieving the highest point values. The Players of the game collect creatures, anatomy, and valuable information as they gain experience points playing this exciting new sci-fi adventure card game!

Story- Experience the thrill of being a Voider on Mission Scorpius! Enter an unusual scientific realm where knowledge is the key to survival, and beware of the space creatures lurking within the unknown territory of the Lumen Void. Much is to be discovered from the unique space monsters to astronomical events (Expansion packs) but only those who gain the most experience will have what it takes to survive.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Scott Pilgrim Miniatures The World: Expansion Box
boardgame.description:
This expansion box includes the additional battles against Evil Exs #2-7!
Includes components for the following:
Lucus Lee Battle Expansion
Todd Ingram Battle Expansion
Roxie Richter Battle Expansions
Katayanagi Twins Battle Expansion
Gideon Graves Battle Expansion

Scott Pilgrim Miniatures the World is a competitive board game where one team takes on the role of Scott and the other Good Guys to fight against the League of Evil Exes. Each character has unique powers, and as they battle, they will level up and unlock new special abilities. The action takes place on a pop-up board with large detailed miniatures, custom dice, and 3D constructible objects for smashing and throwing!

boardgame.name: Infinity: Raveneye
boardgame.description:
The assault on the Raveneye Orbital Complex, a defensive military compound disguised as a communications relay station, has been the key to opening the way for the Morat Aggression Forces’ deployment in the Durgama region, and has furthered the Combined Army’s conquests on Concilium Prima, the political heart of the Human Sphere. What could possibly be so important to the almighty leader of the Combined Army? Or could it be just another smokescreen to divert the attention of the Concilium Coordinated Command?

The book “Infinity: Raveneye” is an expansion for Infinity that broadens its universe and background, focusing on the Military Orders of PanOceania, Ariadna’s Kosmoflot and its new territory of Khurland, the Nomad mothership Corregidor, and the Morat Aggression Forces of the Combined Army, as well as mercenaries for NA2. It also includes three narrative scenarios that recreate the assault on this orbital station, which can be played as a campaign or independently, in addition to painting tutorials for the Military Orders’ Crosiers, Corregidor’s Intruders, Kosmoflot’s Para-Commandos, and Morat’s Vanguard Infantry. Connect now and lead your elite force into the most dangerous war zones of the Human Sphere!

boardgame.name: Field Guide to Random Table Design in RPGs
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

What probability structure is right for you?

Publisher's blurb:

This is about selecting and modifying different random table structures, and not how to make more creative content to go into random tables.

boardgame.name: Asian Devil's Lair
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A natural cave system in a thick bamboo forest, which was used in ancient times as a temple. Statues of a robed god line the central cavern, while further in a statue of a devil stands before a worn prayer rug. Engraved at the heart of the temple is a yin-yang, cut deep into the floor.

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure prompt featuring locals who worship good and evil gods equally, to preserve the free will the gods imbued mortals with, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Alchemist's Sealed Laboratory Excavation
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This laboratory built high into a dangerous cliff was sealed from the inside, and is filled with ancient machinery and mysterious crystals. The only portal out was locked within it, as well. But an excavation site has been built beyond the laboratory, with an elevator leading up from the ground–ready to crack open the vault and plumb its secrets!

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure prompt featuring an alchemist who created rogue homunculi, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Sea Eagle Roosts
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Waves crash against this cliffside. The natural cavern safely above the spray is filled with large nests. Intricate tunnels leading in suggest that this place might have once been used for something else, before the birds moved in.

With this map and its funny one-shot adventure prompt featuring a crazy old man seeking to capture a harpy specimen to breed them in captivity, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Underdark Cliffside Outpost
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Glowing fungi cling to the cliffs below this outpost. An elevator leads up to this series of caverns, while further in are strange rooms which might be used as roosting areas for bats and the smugglers who rise them.

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure prompt featuring a young girl who was turned into a bio-weapon as a magical experiment, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Necromancer's Underground Cavern Lair
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Green magma flickers in this eerie cavern system, sending up emerald sparks. Green crystals line the walls, while skulls are engraved into the cold stone floor. An embalming station waits for the necromancer to do his quiet work, while altars to various evil dieties line the halls.

With this map and its system-agnostic one-shot adventure featuring a misunderstood necromancer who just wants to make friends for his birthday party, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a hilarious session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Necromancer's Jungle Cavern Lair
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Red light illuminates this eerie cavern system. An embalming station waits for the necromancer to do his quiet work, while altars to various evil deities line the halls. Outside, thick jungle looms beside pools of water.

With this map and its system-agnostic one-shot adventure featuring an evil spirit in search of the perfect body, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Red Dragon's Lair
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A huge hoard of gold and treasure glistens beautifully against red magma. Embers dance throughout the lava caverns, while dens for kobolds or other servants have been carved into the cave walls further in. Murder holes wait for intruders, while a metal statue of a dragon forms a shrine in another room.

With this map and its system-agnostic one-shot adventure featuring stealing an absent red dragon’s sword to become the rightful ruler, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Sky City Battlement
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Ever wanted to take your players to a city in the sky?

Now you can! This battlemap is painted in a realistic style, and shows a beautiful sky port with cranes ready to unload shipments from inbound vessels. Further in stands a fierce, spiked battlement guarding the gates to the city itself. Within that city are small buildings and market stalls, ripe for the trade of exotic and bizarre goods.

Not only will this battlemap save you a LOT of prep-time, but it’s also designed to encourage creative and tactical play via good level design. On top of that, the map comes ready for VTTs or easy home printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions.

boardgame.name: Dragon's Frozen Dread Caverns
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

An ice glacier has been hollowed out to form a series of caverns, replete with murder holes and hidden rooms. Stone golems wander through it, guarding it from intruders. At their heart waits the entombed bones of a dragon, encased in thick ice…

With this map and its system-agnostic one-shot adventure featuring the true resurrection of the bronze dragon Ilthanoth, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Kobold's Lair
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

This kobold’s lair is filled with traps, and little dens where the creatures sleep. Much of it has been overgrown, and there is an altar to a dragon statue which connects to the surface–allowing anyone who speaks through a pipe at the top to sound like they are the dragon giving the kobold’s commands.

With this map and its system-agnostic one-shot adventure featuring a small boy who–through a hilarious sequence of events–has tricked the kobolds into thinking he is The Great Dragon, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Skinwalker's Jungle Caverns
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

These jungle caverns are filled with red, fleshy growths that reek of evil and decay. Leathery-shelled eggs wait, filled with fleshy monster spawn, while a grotesque shrine with the skull of a beast is the magical source of this terrible, spreading curse.

With this map and its system-agnostic one-shot adventure featuring skinwalkers who have invaded a remote town and are slowly eating all the population, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Flooded Jungle Caverns of the Great Stone
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

These jungle caverns are filled with water and overgrown by the dense greenery from the jungle beyond. At its heart waits a stone altar, said to give the worthy answers they seek so long as they can pass the trial …

With this map and its system-agnostic one-shot adventure featuring the Stone of Insight and a test to see if you are wise enough to handle the answers you seek, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Farmstead on the Styx
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The river styx flows past this heavily-fortified farmstead in the hells, which grows THE hottest ghost chillies in all the planes. The secret? Using souls as fertilizer.

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure prompt featuring neighboring devils who want to keep all the souls to themselves, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Fortified Farmstead
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A river flows past this heavily-fortified farmstead in a forest, with rows of succulent greens growing behind high stone walls. A small fort waits by the bank of the river. What dangers lurk beyond the walls, in the wilds?

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure prompt featuring some scummy con-artists and a witch, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Retired Adventurer's Farmstead
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A river flows past this heavily-fortified farmstead which is built behind a mountainous pass and sealed behind thick metal doors. Rows of succulent magical herbs grow behind the barricades. A small fort waits by the bank of the river. Why is this place cut off from the rest of the world?

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure prompt featuring dangerous, animated plants with roots the size of men (who do NOT like being harvested), you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Ruined Jungle Fort of the Katan
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A river flows past this small, ruined fortress situated behind a mountain pass. It is built along the flowing water, while jungle grows densely around (and inside) it.

With this map and its detailed one-shot adventure prompt perfect for a bard and featuring giant beetles, you’ll save so much time as you prepare for a fun session. The battlemap comes ready for both VTTs and easy home (or professional) printing—so you can use it no matter how you prefer to run your sessions!

boardgame.name: Underdark Farmstead
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A river flows past this small farmstead in the underdark, situated in a large cavern. Strange, purple crops rise up from the fields.
